title: LF Serious high level ranked team
body:
Here me out, I am plat III, but I believe I have what it takes to be apart of a dia+ team(just a high elo team in general). I have the time, plus mechanics. I can follow instructions well and do not get salty. I have a mic and any comms program you need. 

Now a little about myself. My name is Lochie, 20 years old as of yesterday. Been playing this game for 3 years. Unemployed (been accepted into army, but wont be deployed for some time). I'm a very competitive player and yes, I do have that "I'm as good as a diamond" attitude sometimes because I want it. The dream was to become a pro gamer, but it is dead. I'm still trying even with little time I have left and I want to spend it on becoming the best version of myself in League. 

So please, considered trialing me, sometime I can learn from it also (to see if I'm actually not high elo material)

Role: ADC
IGN: Dopa Apdo (can name change if required)
Practice times: literally when ever.
Some additional Contact Info: lochlan.brown@hotmail.com

replies.body: Well, you're free to join my mates team. We're on an extremely high MMR silver I team. So if you're interested add me in game ^_^ We also need another official ADC as ours left for uni.
